name: VISO TRUST
description: This plugin creates vendor relationships on VISO TRUST for the the applications present in the CE, it also attaches tags to the relationship based on the CCI Scores. Note this plugin does not support pulling applications or their scores from VISO TRUST.

configuration.label: VISO TRUST Base URL
configuration.description: Base URL for the VISO TRUST instance.

configuration.label: VISO TRUST Business Owner Email
configuration.description: VISO TRUST Business Owner email address associated with the instance.
